channel.title: Comments for page "Something Good"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Something Good"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Does that mean double the overall total determination bonus, or does it simply add double what it would have been, when you do the dance party?

Example: I have 9% determination bonus, from before I got the drop, and get a 2% today. Will I have a 13% damage bonus, because only the determination you get after you got the drop doubles, or 22% damage bonus, because it all doubles?

Edit: Nevermind, got the answer, it's the whole thing…admins, feel free to delete this…
